description:
I’ve decided to bring my real life partner to Divine Bitches! In this insanely hot femdom scene I invite you into my personal bedroom to see what it’s like to fuck me in my personal life. I bare all with my partner, Will Havoc, and show you what it’s like to live with a dominatrix full time and just how intense our sexual appetite can be! Our chemistry is on fire! This is a once in a lifetime chance to see me demand how I liked to be fucked and demand him to impregnante me! Not to me missed!

xo,
Maitresse Madeline Marlowe
title: A Devoted Man: Real Love, Real Consent, Real Kink
